llm_text:
Why: The flag is driven primarily by payment_format_ach=1 (SHAP +2.90659), which strongly increased the score. Large transaction size contributed: amount_paid=10873.2 (SHAP +0.7632) and amount_received=10873.2 (SHAP +0.600271) both increased the score, showing a sizeable, matched transfer. Receiving bank to_bank=20 (SHAP +0.581884) also raised the score. Hour=6 (SHAP -0.272553) modestly reduced the score. payment_currency_euro=1 had a small positive effect (SHAP +0.156075).

Conclusion: The model flagged an ACH transfer (payment_format_ach=1) of ~10873.2 in the payment currency (payment_currency_euro=1) with identical paid/received amounts to to_bank=20, producing a net increased risk signal. If ACH transfers of this magnitude to to_bank=20 are atypical for the customer, a focused review is recommended.
